headline: Simulation Software Market Surges to $36.22 billion by 2030 - Dominated by Dassault Systemes (France), Ansys (US), Autodesk (US)
summary: Delray Beach, FL, Aug. 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- According to MarketsandMarkets™, the Simulation Software Market size is estimated to grow from USD 19.95 Billion in 2024 to USD 36.22 Billion by 2030 at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 10.4 % during the forecast period.
